title: Bug 128359The logic is not correctly when a filter is added to the table on the layout
description: We consume that the dataset has 10 records(DataResultA).
OB: When a filter is added to the table on the layout, the logic is not correctly applied.
EB: The filter should correctly apply the logic and display the filtered records on the table on the layout.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:

1. Create a report and new a datasource and a dataset.
2. Set a filter (FilterA) in the dataset.
3. Observe that only 6 records (DataResultB) are gained instead of the expected 10 records (DataResultA).
